name: channel-caption-bot
description: A Telegram bot for all your mirror needs

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable Webhooks when in env mode

BOT_TOKEN.description: The telegram bot token that you get from @BotFather.

OWNER_ID.description: The Telegram User ID of the Owner of the Bot. Get it by using /info in @MissRose_bot.

TELEGRAM_API.description: This is to authenticate to your telegram account for downloading Telegram files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org.

TELEGRAM_HASH.description: This is to authenticate to your telegram account for downloading Telegram files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Add the Heroku app name here.
